jsdp.sdp

Class ForwardRecursion

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsdp.sdp.Recursion
      • jsdp.sdp.ForwardRecursion
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BR_ForwardRecursion, BRF_ForwardRecursion, BRL_ForwardRecursion, CF_ForwardRecursion, sS_ForwardRecursion

    public abstract class ForwardRecursion
extends Recursion
    Implements a forward recursion algorithm to solve a stochastic dynamic program.
    Author:
    Roberto Rossi

      • runForwardRecursion

        public double runForwardRecursion(State state)
        Runs the forward recursion algorithm for the given stochastic dynamic program and computes the expected value function starting from state state.
        Parameters:
        state - the initial state.
        Returns:
        the expected value of running the system from state state.
